channel.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
channel.description:
[center][font=arial][size=24pt].::Welcome to the Official NewFound PK Beta/Developer Applications!::.[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=arial][size=24pt][color=red]Important:[/font] [b]If you are intrested in becoming a Developer/Beta tester for our server, Please fill out the application below and post it in the comments, Send us an E-Mail at [email]NewfoundPK@Hotmail.com[/email], or message us on Skype. Both of our skypes are as follows;[/b] [/center]
[center]Ryanloves.nevershoutnever (Ryan) Jacob.Cooper81 (Neglagence)[/center]
[center][B]Please keep in mind that your application may not be checked automaticly, Please allow 24-48 hours for a responce to your application.[/B][/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]------ Server Information ------[/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]Positions left to be filled.[/b][/size][/center] [center]GFX Designer : [b]0/1[/b][/center] [center]Website Developer : [b]0/1[/b][/center] [center]Beta Tester : [b]0/5[/b][/center] [center]Client Coders : [b]0/1[/b] [/center] [center]Server-sided Coder: [b]1/2[/b][/center]
[size=14pt][center][b]Server Staff Roster[/b][/center] [center]Owner(s) : Neglagence and Ryan[/center] [center]Server Administrators : [/center] [center]Server Moderators : [/center] [center]Server Support : [/center] [center]Respected Donators : [/center] [center]Donators : [/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]------ What are we looking for/Applications ? ------[/size][/b][/center]
[center]WebDesigners, Format:
Position Applying for: Name: Age: Skype: Proof of Work: Experience: ------------------------------------------------------------------------- Beta Testers, Format:
Position Applying for: Name: Age: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Msn: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Moderator, Format:
Applying For: Name: Msn: Why you would be good staff: Age: Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Administrator, Format:
Applying For: Name: Skype: Why you would be good staff: Age: Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Do you have any gfx experience?: Do you have any coding experience?: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hoster, Format:
Applying for: Name: Msn: Have you hosted a server before: Do you have a vps if not do you have a good computer?: Age: Why Should we Chose you: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ GFX Designer, Format:
Position Applying for: Name: Age: Skype: Proof of Work: Experience: -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Server-Side Coder, Format:
Age: Experience in java: Position applying for: Why should i choose you?: What could you bring to NewFound Pk: Proof of work: Msn: --------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=12pt]The following rewards/payments will be made to the people who get the job.[/size][/b]
- Hoster will recieve Owner In-game. - Video Specialist will recieve Respected Donator in-game - Beta Tester will recieve permanent Donator Rank in-game. - GFX Designer will recieve a custom forums rank and Primal armor set in game. - Website Designer will recieve forum Moderator and Respected Donator Ingame[/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]------ Why this server ? ------[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b]You should choose to help us because we have several things that other servers don't, Such as some of the following.[/b][/center]
[center][b]-317 Loading Higher Content -Fast Loading Client -Perfect Pking -Amazing Combat -10x Hits -317 Hitmarks -Pking Skill with Rewards -317 running a 604 cache -Ability to switch gameframe ingame -Many Bosses -Lots of Minigames -Duel arena with staking Shop -Working Clan Chat -Custom Interfaces -Custom Quest Tab -Working D Claw special -Pk Points with Rewards -Working Experience Counter -All Ancient Curses -Donator Island -Anti-Dupe -Easy 1 click character save -Amazing Switching -3-item minimum pking[/b] [/center]
[center][b][size=15pt]------ What source/client are we using ? ------[/size][/b][/center]
[center]We would like to give credit to Hybrid PVP's source and client.[/center]
[center]Here are some screenshots[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/205z6m0.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
item.dc:creator: @joshbalz joshbalz
item.description:
@joshbalz wrote:

Applying For:moderator
Name:Josh
Msn: i do have an msn it is ckyyounggun@aol.com
Why you would be good staff:i know how to respect/ have fun with the server and i can do so without abusing my powers. i can also help other who need the help i have been moderator on other servers
Age:17
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? of course, i would not abuse the powers i am given and i will follow the rules

Read full topic

item.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

Moderator, Format:

Applying For: Moderator [Head Moderator]
Name: Ryan Taubert [Derrezed]
Msn: Dont use… Dementhium@yahoo.com is my Yahoo.
Why you would be good staff: i am a great coder and know what to look for when finding glitches/glitchers. Also i am a quick learner when it comes to knowing the rules and i follow all of them + i dont argue i simply agree and state and ideas that come to mind.
Age: 16
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? : yes, i will follow the rules. No, i wont abuse my powers. there is no point in that. it just ruins servers.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
item.dc:creator: @Exstasy Exstasy
item.description:
@Exstasy wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:18, topic:416776”][quote author=Exstasy link=topic=518670.msg3788887#msg3788887 date=1319128154]

First of all i just want to say. I love the pictures + neat format of your post, looks like you put a lot of effort into it so i can tell that you mean business unlike most people on mopar.

Applying For: Administrator/Head Admin
Name: Phil
Skype: i think its phil.wheel if not, email me, i check my emails regularly!! phil.wheel@yahoo.com
Why you would be good staff: I think i would make a great administrator on your server because I enjoy helping people, and tell people to do their jobs right! Also my main goal to being staff on any server, is put an end to abusers! I’ve been Mod, and Admin on multiple servers, every time i ban/mute/jail somebody, i ALWAYS have evidence just in case you need proof!
Age: 16
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Ofcourse! As i stated earlier, i hate abusers, a server isn’t friendly with abusers, it is extremely annoying.
Do you have any gfx experience?: I do not, i made a banner previously, but it didn’t turn out well. AT ALL.
Do you have any coding experience?: Yes sir, i do.

Extra info: Well i hope you pick me to help you with your server/administrate it. I love the looks of it, looks like it would be extremely fun to play and help get to the top!

Ik ur second account… Your second account is we rushed god…

yeah it is, i forgot the password to it though, as i explained in your private messaged
[/quote]
no you quit it because you have 0 rep///[/quote]
since these are useless posts and i don’t feel like spamming a topic, pm me if u want to argue, but no i didn’t quit it, i don’t care about rep, i use this site for 1 purpose, development towards runescape private servers, so why would i care about rep?

Read full topic

Name: Chris (ironic)
Age: 15 (also ironic)
Skype: Message me for it
Proof of Work: http://www.tankwaretech.com
WARING ADULTS ONLY: 18+
http://www.sunybuffabitches.tankwaretech.com

Experience: 3-4 years

item.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

[code]------ Why this server ? ------

You should choose to help us because we have several things that other servers don’t, Such as some of the following.

-317 Loading Higher Content
-Fast Loading Client
-Perfect Pking
-Amazing Combat
-10x Hits
-317 Hitmarks
-Pking Skill with Rewards
-317 running a 604 cache
-Ability to switch gameframe ingame
-Many Bosses
-Lots of Minigames
-Duel arena with staking Shop
-Working Clan Chat
-Custom Interfaces
-Custom Quest Tab
-Working D Claw special
-Pk Points with Rewards
-Working Experience Counter
-All Ancient Curses
-Donator Island
-Anti-Dupe
-Easy 1 click character save
-Amazing Switching
-3-item minimum pking
[/code]
All hybrid pvps have this. And I wouldn’t exactly say the combat is amazing as it is half assed.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI].::NewFound PK!::. || 317 || [PI] || CODING TEAM NEEDED! ||
item.dc:creator: @zosai zosai
item.description:
@zosai wrote:

[center][font=arial][size=24pt].::Welcome to the Official NewFound PK Beta/Developer Applications!::.[/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=arial][size=24pt][color=red]Important:[/font] If you are intrested in becoming a Developer/Beta tester for our server, Please fill out the application below and post it in the comments, Send us an E-Mail at NewfoundPK@Hotmail.com, or message us on Skype. Both of our skypes are as follows;
[/center]

[center]Ryanloves.nevershoutnever (Ryan)
Jacob.Cooper81 (Neglagence)[/center]

[center]Please keep in mind that your application may not be checked automaticly, Please allow 24-48 hours for a responce to your application.[/center]

[center][size=15pt]------ Server Information ------[/size][/center]

[center][size=12pt]Positions left to be filled.[/size][/center]
[center]GFX Designer : 0/1[/center]
[center]Website Developer : 0/1[/center]
[center]Beta Tester : 0/5[/center]
[center]Client Coders : 0/1 [/center]
[center]Server-sided Coder: 1/2[/center]

[size=14pt][center]Server Staff Roster[/center]
[center]Owner(s) : Neglagence and Ryan[/center]
[center]Server Administrators : [/center]
[center]Server Moderators : [/center]
[center]Server Support : [/center]
[center]Respected Donators : [/center]
[center]Donators : [/center]

[center][size=15pt]------ What are we looking for/Applications ? ------[/size][/center]

[center]WebDesigners, Format:

Position Applying for:
Name:
Age:
Skype:
Proof of Work:
Experience:

Beta Testers, Format:

Position Applying for:
Name:
Age:
How active will you be:
Any experience in this?:
Msn:

Moderator, Format:

Applying For:
Name:
Msn:
Why you would be good staff:
Age:
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?

Administrator, Format:

Applying For:
Name:
Skype:
Why you would be good staff:
Age:
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?:
Do you have any gfx experience?:
Do you have any coding experience?:

Hoster, Format:

Applying for:
Name:
Msn:
Have you hosted a server before:
Do you have a vps if not do you have a good computer?:
Age:
Why Should we Chose you:

GFX Designer, Format:

Position Applying for:
Name:
Age:
Skype:
Proof of Work:
Experience:

Server-Side Coder, Format:

Age:
Experience in java:
Position applying for:
Why should i choose you?:
What could you bring to NewFound Pk:
Proof of work:
Msn:

[size=12pt]The following rewards/payments will be made to the people who get the job.[/size]

  • Hoster will recieve Owner In-game.
  • Video Specialist will recieve Respected Donator in-game
  • Beta Tester will recieve permanent Donator Rank in-game.
  • GFX Designer will recieve a custom forums rank and Primal armor set in game.
  • Website Designer will recieve forum Moderator and Respected Donator Ingame[/center]

[center][size=15pt]------ Why this server ? ------[/size][/center]

[center]You should choose to help us because we have several things that other servers don’t, Such as some of the following.[/center]

[center]-317 Loading Higher Content
-Fast Loading Client
-Perfect Pking
-Amazing Combat
-10x Hits
-317 Hitmarks
-Pking Skill with Rewards
-317 running a 604 cache
-Ability to switch gameframe ingame
-Many Bosses
-Lots of Minigames
-Duel arena with staking Shop
-Working Clan Chat
-Custom Interfaces
-Custom Quest Tab
-Working D Claw special
-Pk Points with Rewards
-Working Experience Counter
-All Ancient Curses
-Donator Island
-Anti-Dupe
-Easy 1 click character save
-Amazing Switching
-3-item minimum pking
[/center]

[center][size=15pt]------ What source/client are we using ? ------[/size][/center]
